subject: Re: Tone mod-1
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
Frank,

5 seconds in, i hear "Frank is Purple" very clear.  

-Steve H.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
>  Hard to hear in the cell phone video, but just had time to do a 
quickie demo before having to run to work. Thought I might as well 
keep posting the information so it can be ripped off by the ones 
selling their stufff, and they can say how flawed my stuff is. I 
really don't mind others taking the ideas and making improvements, 
changes, and making a profit, but ya don't have to beat me up in the 
process.  See the current TAPs paramag for the curious. I heard about 
it through someone that gets the mag, but don't know anything first 
hand. I don't care that much to spend money to get magazine. 
Paranormal=Hollywood=$$$. 
>  
>  I am well aware of the short comings of my equipment, I'm just 
honest enough not to sell it till it's perfected. I'm not an 
engineer, just a hillbilly techno droid trying satisfy her own 
curiousity.  
>  
>  Frank-S
